articles.title: Trump calls China's AI DeepSeek breakthrough ‘a wakeup call' — but ‘positive' if true
articles.author: Steven Nelson
articles.summary: A Chinese company launched a new AI platform named DeepSeek, claiming it is faster and less expensive than US competitors such as OpenAI. DeepSeek's offering instantly became the top download on the Apple App Store. This development has caused concern among US investors, impacting the Nasdaq Composite and leading to a drop in NVIDIA's stock.

articles.title: Earth Ninja Launches Trash Ninja: The Ultimate Trash Can Odor Eliminator
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Earth Ninja launched Trash Ninja, a trash freshener designed to eliminate odors with activated charcoal. It comes in Ocean and Citrus scents. Trash Ninja offers a long-lasting solution aimed at busy families.

articles.title: The 'easy' £29 Next dress shoppers can wear a dozen different ways
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next is selling a V-Neck Ponte Pinafore Mini Dress for £29. Shoppers say the dress is 'very comfortable' and 'looks great on', with one reviewer noting good quality. The dress is available in a checked version as well.

articles.title: Best Website Builder for 2025
articles.author: Dianna Gunn
articles.summary: Squarespace is suitable for professional portfolios, Wix for service-based businesses due to appointment booking tools, Shopify for e-commerce stores, and GoDaddy for personal sites. Wix offers a comprehensive suite of website editing tools but some companies like Wix have strict storage limits. Shopify focuses on e-commerce.

articles.title: Introducing Brand+ by Amazon Ads: Utilize Data from Amazon's Shopping, Browsing, and Streaming Activities for Marketing Success
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Amazon Ads is launching Brand+, a new advertising offering combining shopping, browsing, and streaming signals to identify consumers likely to purchase a brand's product or service within three months. During beta testing, some advertisers experienced sales increases of over 10% and website traffic jumps of over 70%. Thorne, a wellness company, has stated that Brand+ was a "game changer" during the beta phase and are doubling down on their STV strategy in 2025.

articles.title: Progresso launches soup candy you can suck on: What reviews said about chicken noodle flavor
articles.author: Shauna  Stuart
articles.summary: Progresso launched Chicken Noodle Soup Drops, a savory hard candy featuring the flavor of their Chicken Noodle Soup. Available every Thursday in January at progressosoupdrops.com, the drops come in a can with 20 candies and a can of real Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup for $2.49 plus shipping.

articles.title: Samsung may be about to score a double victory over Apple — here's how
articles.author: Alex Blake
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly launching its Galaxy S25 Edge phone before Apple's iPhone 17 Air. Samsung's AI based on Google Gemini is also said to be ahead of Apple Intelligence. The article focuses on timing and quality in product releases.

articles.title: Innovative makeup ingredients: Shaping the future of beauty
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Dr.Rashel is mentioned as the co-founder of the new products. Innovations in makeup products now include nourishing and hydrating ingredients. Primers include SPF and antioxidants, foundations offer adaptive pigments and hydration, and concealers incorporate almond oil, shea butter, and vitamin C. Lip products include shea butter or oils. Modern eyebrow products include castor oil.

articles.title: Nvidia Calls DeepSeek ‘Excellent' AI Advance, Dismisses Concerns
articles.author: Ian King
articles.summary: DeepSeek, a Chinese startup, released a new AI model. Nvidia stated that DeepSeek's AI advancement complies with US export controls and that inference still requires significant numbers of Nvidia GPUs. There is concern that DeepSeek's offering reduces the need for Nvidia's expensive hardware.

articles.title: Consumer-focused blockchain Abstract unveils mainnet
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: Abstract, a consumer-focused blockchain product utilizing ZKsync's zero-knowledge stack, has been introduced. It aims to provide enhanced features and benefits to consumers within the blockchain space.

articles.title: DeepSeek Piles Pressure on AI Rivals With New Image Model Release
articles.summary: DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, has launched Janus Pro, a new family of open-source multimodal models. DeepSeek claims that Janus Pro outperforms OpenAI's DALL-E 3 and Stable Diffusion.

articles.title: AP Trending SummaryBrief at 2:26 p.m. EST
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is introducing a new Coca-Cola Orange Cream flavor. This launch aligns with a nostalgic trend in the beverage market.

articles.title: Welcome to ‘The White Lotus' Collabs: HBO Rings in New Season With Official Iced Tea Release
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Saint James Iced Tea introduced a new flavor. The new flavor is inspired by Thai mangoes.

articles.title: AP Trending SummaryBrief at 1:40 p.m. EST
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching a new Coca-Cola Orange Cream flavor. This new product leverages a nostalgic trend.

articles.title: Innovative Security Systems Unveiled at CES 2025: Long-Range Wireless and AI-Powered Solutions
articles.author: TBE Media
articles.summary: At CES 2025, Max introduced the Max Ranger 4K, a long-range wireless security system capable of monitoring properties from up to 2,000 feet away. Swann unveiled an AI-powered doorbell with 4K video, capable of conversing in 100 languages and recognizing visitors with high detail, priced at $199 for the 4K model.

articles.title: New Tesla Model Y vs Old Model Y - which do you prefer?
articles.author: Fred Lambert
articles.summary: Tesla has unveiled the Model Y Juniper refresh, featuring updated specs and design changes. The new model includes second-generation suspension and noise reduction hardware, an 8" second-row touchscreen, hands-free power open trunk, wrap-around ambient lighting, and power-actuated second-row air vents, with a starting price of $46,490 and availability starting in March.

articles.title: Another big disruption by OpenAI: ChatGPT owner launches Operator, an AI agent, that will change how people use the internet and their PCs
articles.summary: OpenAI, the company behind ChatGPT, has launched its first AI agent named 'Operator'. This AI agent is designed to solve complex problems independently, control web browsers, and perform tasks without human supervision, representing a significant advancement in AI technology.

articles.title: Free car washes offered as Tommy's Express set to open in Grand Blanc Township
articles.author: Fuad Shalhout
articles.summary: Tommy's Express Car Wash is launching its first location in Grand Blanc Township, offering free car washes from January 31st to February 2nd. The new location features efficient service, a three-minute wash tunnel, free floor mat washers, on-site vacuum stations, and TommyClub unlimited wash memberships via the Tommy's Express app, with options for four different wash packages.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3) or Phone (3a)? CEO Carl Pei teases upcoming device launch on 4 March: What to expect
articles.author: Livemint
articles.summary: Nothing plans to announce a new product on March 4, 2025, speculated to be the Nothing Phone (3) or Phone (3a). The device, teased with 'Power in Perspective,' will be available via Flipkart and may feature an iPhone-inspired Action Button and either a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 or MediaTek Dimensity 9200+ chipset.

articles.title: Aldi launches new hair dupe on shelves TODAY – and it's £65 cheaper than pricey version loved by Rihanna
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its Lacura HR Hair Repair Leave-in Conditioning Mask, priced at £4.99, alongside a new hair repair oil, also at £4.99. Additionally, Aldi introduced two new scents, Rose, Rhubarb and Musk and Sea Salt and Fennel, to its Hotel Collection Luxury Aroma Candle range, available for £5.99.

articles.title: AP Trending SummaryBrief at 12:08 p.m. EST
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching a new flavor, Coca-Cola Orange Cream, tapping into a nostalgic trend.

articles.title: Shopper Blog: Soapy Obsession's owner turns scented laundry products into sweet smell of success
articles.author: Knoxville News Sentinel
articles.summary: Rose Hill's company, Soapy Obsession, is offering scented laundry soap in 32-ounce containers for $16, and combination packs of scented soap, booster, and dryer balls for $40. The company has also branched out into scented lotions and shower oils, with travel-sized combination packs available for $6 and 10-ounce bottles for $10. These products are available through the Soapy Obsession Facebook page and at Kaydee Rowe's beauty salon.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy new ‘roadside hero' in middle aisle – and it costs just €4.99
articles.author: Lauren Kelly
articles.summary: ALDI Ireland has launched a new Tyre Puncture Sealant Can, priced at €4.99, designed as an instant roadside solution for punctures. Available in stores from January 30, the sealant can fits in the glove compartment, allowing users to quickly mend punctures.

articles.title: LambdaTest Becomes the First in the Market to Launch Samsung Galaxy S25 Series for App Testing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LambdaTest has introduced the Samsung Galaxy S25 series (S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra) on its real devices platform for testing. This launch allows developers and testers to conduct manual and automated tests on the new Samsung devices before their official retail release.

articles.title: LambdaTest Becomes the First in the Market to Launch Samsung Galaxy S25 Series for App Testing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LambdaTest announced the availability of the Samsung Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, on its real devices platform before its official retail launch. This allows developers and testers to run manual and automated tests on these devices early, ensuring flawless app rollouts and delivering an unbeatable user experience on cutting-edge devices.

articles.title: LambdaTest Becomes the First in the Market to Launch Samsung Galaxy S25 Series for App Testing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LambdaTest announced that the Samsung Galaxy S25 series is live on its real devices platform before the official retail launch. This offers developers and testers the opportunity to run tests on the latest Samsung Galaxy devices. This allows users to validate app performance on Samsung's S25 series before it reaches consumers.

articles.title: LambdaTest Becomes the First in the Market to Launch Samsung Galaxy S25 Series for App Testing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: LambdaTest announced that the Samsung Galaxy S25 series (S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra) is now live on their real devices platform. This access is available a week before the official retail launch date.

articles.title: LambdaTest Becomes the First in the Market to Launch Samsung Galaxy S25 Series for App Testing
articles.summary: LambdaTest is offering early access to the Samsung Galaxy S25 series on its platform, allowing developers and testers to perform manual and automated app testing before the device's official release. This provides a service for optimizing application performance, compatibility, and user experience on Samsung's flagship S25 series.

articles.title: Papa John's Guyana now accepting online orders for pickup
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Papa John's Guyana has launched an online ordering service for pickup at its Vlissengen Road location, accessible via their website and mobile app. The system supports secure payments with credit cards and provides real-time order status updates. Additionally, Papa John's will soon launch a loyalty rewards program and a delivery service.

articles.title: Introducing Stetson Spirit: The Cool Edge of Men's Grooming Innovation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Stetson has launched a new men's grooming line called Stetson Spirit in partnership with Scent Beauty. The collection features innovative cooling technology and Stetson's quality and craftsmanship.

articles.title: B&M shoppers baffled as they spot 'new' Maltesers flavour in stores
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: B&M stores have been spotted selling a new honeycomb flavored version of Maltesers. This new flavor is generating discussion among consumers as some believe it is the same as the original malt flavored Maltesers, while others recognize the difference in flavor profiles.

articles.title: The Best Housewarming Gifts
articles.author: Hillary Essien
articles.summary: Shop Vivano offers 400-thread count cotton bedsheets with a sateen weave, priced between ₦12,000.00 – ₦250,000. Kitchessence sells elongated bowl design long stem wine glasses for ₦16,900 and wooden chopping boards for ₦9,200. Shop Kara provides a budget-friendly blender with dual functionality for ₦17,500. Studio Concierge offers a Topography Ashtray for ₦16,500.

articles.title: AI agents? Yes, let's automate all sorts of things that don't actually need it
articles.author: Thomas Claburn
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced Operator, a research preview AI agent available to US Pro tier subscribers. This service combines generative AI with multimodal models and web automation, enabling tasks such as booking rental cars and hotels.  Operator aims to act as an intermediary between customers and businesses, raising questions about its value proposition for businesses and potential impact on user experience.

articles.title: This portable travel steamer got all the wrinkles out of my bridesmaid dress — and it's on sale on Amazon Canada
articles.author: Sarah Rohoman
articles.summary: HiLIFE Steamer is available on Amazon Canada. This travel steamer weighs just over 1.5 pounds, holds up to 240 mL of water and provides up to 15 minutes of continuous steaming and works on a wide range of fabrics. In the past month, more than 1,000 people purchased this item.

articles.title: 9 Best Hair Powders for Thin Hair to Add Volume and Grit to Any Style
articles.author: Jenny Berg
articles.summary: Several companies like Sexy Hair, Design Me, Schwarzkopf, Oribe, Crown Affair, Bumble and Bumble, Kevin Murphy, and Unite offer hair powders designed to add volume and texture to thin hair. These products, such as Sexy Hair Big Powder Play, Design Me Puff.Me Light Volumizing Powder, and Oribe's Swept Up Volume Powder Spray, vary in application methods and key ingredients, catering to different hair types and styling preferences. Many products also offer additional benefits like oil absorption, UV protection, and scalp hydration.

articles.title: The January 2025 Best New Beauty Products To Refresh Your Routine
articles.author: Erin Lukas
articles.summary: INNBeauty Project launched Calm The Red Down Dual Chamber Serum, while REFY introduced Sculpting Moisturizer. MERIT released new Flush Balm cream blush shades, and Hourglass made Red 0 available in its full-coverage lip gloss. Other brands launching new products include Ilia, Chanel, The Ordinary, Lancôme, Shani Darden, YSL, Gucci, Benefit, Anastasia Beverly Hills, Laneige, Glossier, MAC, and Mara Roszak. John Frieda, Laura Polko, Aveda, Bumble and bumble, Essie, Iota, and Orange Gelee also introduced new product lines.

articles.title: Ninja's 'best kitchen machine' that 'everyone needs' drops £30
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg
articles.summary: Ninja significantly reduced the price of its Ninja Foodi PossibleCooker on Amazon and other retailers. This eight-in-one appliance features functions like slow cooking, searing, and baking, and has received mostly positive reviews, although some users reported issues with certain cooking functions. Alternative options like Instant Pot Multi-Cooker XL and Geepas 3L 7-in-1 Muticooker are also presented.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers divided over new Pepsi flavour that tastes just like dessert
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Pepsi has introduced two new flavors: Strawberries and Cream Pepsi and Cream Soda Pepsi, available at Tesco. Customer reactions range from enthusiasm to skepticism. Pepsi has also released limited edition options like Apple Pie, Salted Caramel, and Hot Chocolate in the past.

articles.title: Galaxy Unpacked 2025: Making Everyday Life Special With Galaxy AI
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 series, featuring new AI-powered capabilities designed to enhance user experience. The AI Select feature enables users to extract and save specific video moments, while the Fridge Recipe Assistant suggests personalized recipes based on fridge contents. Drawing Assist empowers users to generate high-quality images from sketches and text descriptions, offering versatile options for visual creation.

articles.title: Starbox Launches StarboxAI-IntelliCampaignOptimize, Revolutionizing Campaign Optimization for 180 Degrees Brandcom
articles.author: Starbox Group Holdings Ltd.
articles.summary: Starbox Group Holdings Ltd, through its subsidiary Starbox Technologies, has launched StarboxAI-IntelliCampaignOptimize, an AI-driven system aimed at optimizing marketing campaigns for merchants. This system, supporting 180 Degrees Brandcom, offers real-time optimization, smart budget allocation, personalized targeting, and comprehensive insights, enhancing campaign efficiency and precision.

articles.title: IIT Delhi unveils executive programme for advanced product management
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: IIT Delhi has announced admissions to the third batch of its Executive Programme for Advanced Product Management. This six-month online program aims to provide learners with advanced tools and processes for managing physical and digital products. The curriculum includes modules such as Product Strategy, Development, Design, and Monetization, and provides hands-on experience with tools like Miro, Jira, and Figma.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers 'so happy' with Ninja 2-in-1 blender currently £90 off
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja 2-in-1 Detect Power Blender, featuring 'BlendSense Technology' that automatically adjusts speed, time and pulse. This blender is available on Amazon and is being sold with a significant discount. The blender allows to pick from 15 different functions, with 14 manual and four automatic options.

articles.title: Kaon Interactive Unveils Kaon Demo360+: Transforming B2B Customer Engagement with AI-Powered Interactive Experiences
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Kaon Interactive introduces Kaon Demo360+™, a platform transforming 3D Product Tours into value-driven experiences. The platform uses advanced AI to tailor each demonstration in real time, delivering immersive and outcome-driven value stories. It helps global B2B companies unlock revenue potential, boost efficiency, enhance engagement, accelerate sales, and deliver measurable business impact.

articles.title: "The Banzzai mandarin will quickly become a staple"
articles.summary: The Leclerc store in Drumettaz has introduced the Banzzai mandarin, a new citrus fruit developed by AM Fresh (Genesis Innovation). This product, already a Superior Taste Award winner, is being marketed for its high sugar content, juiciness, and ease of peeling. Consumers have responded positively to the Banzzai mandarin, with strong sales reported despite its premium pricing.

articles.title: 11 Best Coffee Beans For Blonde Roast Fans
articles.author: Dani Zoeller
articles.summary: Starbucks introduced blonde roast espresso as the default in select beverages and the Green Apron Blend, developed with barista input. Coffee on the Porch created a coffee to share with family and friends and the 97 Rock House released White Gold Blonde Roast. Other companies mentioned in tasting notes include Chris's Coffee, Arbuckles', Libertyville Coffee Company, Fogbuster, Vanilla Moose Coffee, and Tierra Farm.

articles.title: Amazon offers nearly 50% off Remington hair dryer that's 'like a salon' product
articles.author: Sonia Sharma
articles.summary: Amazon and Argos are offering a new hair dryer, featuring multiple speed and heat settings, a long cable, and a design praised for efficient drying. While most customers reviewed positively, some found it heavy or cheap, though opinions overall were positive.

articles.title: Mytheresa Prepares Renaming to LuxExperience Upon Closing of YNAP Acquisition
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MYT Netherlands Parent B.V. will rename to LuxExperience B.V. pending acquisition of YOOX NET-A-PORTER, creating a combined digital luxury group. LuxExperience aims to build a global multi-brand presence and will continue to be listed on the NYSE under the ticker symbol 'LUXE'.

articles.title: ‘Soup drops' are General Mills' latest strategy to revive waning Progresso
articles.author: Brooks Johnson
articles.summary: Progresso, owned by General Mills, launched soup-flavored hard candies called soup drops. The limited-edition product is available only on Thursdays in January.

articles.title: Here's how to use Amazon's 'Package X-Ray' on Android
articles.summary: Amazon's Android app introduced Package X-Ray, a new feature that allows users to view the contents of their unopened Amazon packages by scanning the package label within the app. This feature provides product details before opening the deliveries.

articles.title: Lava Yuva Smart Unveiled In India: Affordable Price, Impressive Features, And All The Details You Need
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Yuva Smart, a budget smartphone in India, priced at ₹6,000. The device features a 6.75-inch HD+ display, Unisoc 9863A octa-core processor, 3GB RAM, 64GB internal storage, a 13MP primary camera, and a 5,000mAh battery. It is available on Amazon, Lava's website, and retail partners.

articles.title: Steps to track your Zomato order in real-time
articles.summary: Zomato has introduced real-time order tracking, which allows users to monitor their delivery progress from the restaurant to their doorstep. Users can access this feature in the "Orders" section of the Zomato app after placing an order.

articles.title: From coffee paste to croissant butter: quirky spreads to jazz up your toast
articles.author: Irenie Forshaw
articles.summary: Alexander Häberlin and Philippe Greinacher launched "No Normal Coffee," a coffee paste made from ground coffee, extract, sugar, water, and xanthan gum. Pollen Bakery offers Croissant Butter and Mada Mada sells Black Sesame Praliné, both upmarket spreads.

articles.title: Tesco shoppers gobsmacked after spotting quirky new Pepsi flavour in stores
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Pepsi has launched two new flavors, Strawberries & Cream and Cream Soda, which are now available at Tesco supermarkets. Initial customer reactions have been mixed, with some praising the Strawberries & Cream flavor and others expressing less enthusiasm for both.

articles.title: Sky shoppers snap up Samsung Galaxy tablets in unmissable 11p deal
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 LTE was launched in 2023 as a tablet for everyday entertainment and productivity with a high-resolution 8.7" screen and 64GB of storage. Sky offers it with a data plan for £9.50 a month. Users praise its screen and AI functions, while some note issues with brightness.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers praise 'very powerful' handheld vacuum cleaner now £33
articles.author: Phoebe Barton Lifestyle
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 33% discount on the Portutif Handheld Vacuum Cleaner, a lightweight, cordless vacuum with a 70W motor. The vacuum features a 400ml capacity and comes with attachments for cleaning various surfaces and hard-to-reach spots.

articles.title: Zoom Drain expands Southern California footprint with new Los Angeles location
articles.author: Zoom Drain
articles.summary: Zoom Drain has expanded its drain cleaning and sewer services to the Los Angeles area, specifically Torrance, South Bay, and surrounding locations. The newest franchise will operate under the leadership of Nian Wang, serving home and business owners.

articles.title: Sky Mobile reveals Samsung Galaxy S25 availability and prices - with huge bargain for shoppers
articles.author: Fionnuala Boyle
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled its latest smartphone range, the Galaxy S25, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models, at its Galaxy Unpacked event. These models are available for pre-order and feature an ultra-fast processor, a bright display, and Galaxy AI software, with Sky Mobile offering various deals including free Galaxy Buds3 Pro and double storage.

articles.title: 'I used AI to design my ideal skincare routine and the results after 30 days surprised me'
articles.author: Zoe Cripps
articles.summary: The AI tool ChatGPT has provided personilized skincare routine using products like Paula's Choice Pore-Reducing Toner, Inkey List's SPF30 and Acnecide 5% Face. Incorporating the advice, after a 30 day trial, resulted in a reported much plumper, hydrated and overall happier skin.

articles.title: KRISPY KREME® is Making Hearts Flutter this Valentine's Day with All-New Hearts in Bloom Collection
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Krispy Kreme has introduced a Valentine's Day collection featuring conversation heart-shaped doughnuts with various fillings. The collection includes flavors like You Give Me Butterflies, All the Feels, Crazy for You, and Heartthrob, available for a limited time. These doughnuts are designed for sharing and gifting during the Valentine's season.

articles.title: Berks business owners jump into the ‘Shark Tank'
articles.author: Donna Rovins
articles.summary: Bro Glo plans to elevate their men's self-tanner product.

articles.title: Azureon Launches New Website to Elevate Pool Services Nationwide
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Azureon, a pool care service provider, has launched its official website. The website provides information about Azureon’s vision, mission, strategy, and core values. It enables users to contact and consult with Azureon, offering extended access to pool maintenance by exploring the Azureon platform.

articles.title: ‘Been doing this for years': Woman shares little-known use for Dawn dish soap. Does it work?
articles.author: Alexandra Samuels
articles.summary: Margherita Schiliro shared a TikTok video about using Dawn dish soap as a shampoo alternative. Some users and experts caution against this practice due to its harshness, potentially drying out hair and stripping color, while others claim it effectively removes oil and buildup, similar to a clarifying shampoo. Procter & Gamble (P&G), the manufacturer of Dawn, has been contacted for comment.

articles.title: Five new ways to use your Google lens
articles.author: DC Web Desk
articles.summary: Google Lens enhances user experience through features like product identification for shopping, allowing users to capture a product image to find stores, compare prices, read deals, and view reviews. Additionally, Lens offers fact-checking of images, visual searches, and text summarization capabilities.

articles.title: 'From mattresses and motorbike tyres to UPS batteries and home appliances, we aim to cater to the needs of a typical household'
articles.author: Uzma Khateeb-Nawaz
articles.summary: Qist Bazaar, a 'buy now, pay later' platform, enables customers to purchase products via installments. Their portfolio includes approximately 1,400 products available online and in physical stores, ranging from mattresses to home appliances. The company also utilizes marketing strategies like rickshaw ads and branded mugs to promote their services.

articles.title: Get up to 48% off on top load washing machine on Amazon: Top picks for you from brands like Samsung, LG and more
articles.author: Boudhaditya Sanyal
articles.summary: Several companies including Samsung, LG, Whirlpool, Godrej, and IFB, are offering new top load washing machine models. Samsung highlights its Eco Bubble Technology and Digital Inverter Motor, while LG emphasizes its Smart Inverter Technology and Turbodrum feature. Whirlpool focuses on Hard Water Wash technology and ZPF Technology, and Godrej offers I-Wash Technology and Zero Pressure Technology. IFB features Deep Clean Technology and Aqua Energie.

articles.title: Shahid Kapoor curates playlist in U&i's latest ad film
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: U&i launched a digital ad campaign featuring Shahid Kapoor, showcasing their lifestyle tech accessories. The ad highlights U&i's range of products including audio devices, power solutions, and mobile accessories. This campaign aims to strengthen the brand's image and reach diverse audiences.

articles.title: Fossibot F105 Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Fossibot has launched the Fossibot F105, a rugged smartphone featuring a 10300 mAh battery with 10W wired charging and running on Android 14. The smartphone includes a 6.745-inch display, 4GB RAM, 64GB internal storage, and a 20-megapixel rear camera.

articles.title: Samsung's ‘Screens Everywhere' vision is changing how we use and experience appliances at home
articles.summary: Samsung is launching new Bespoke appliances featuring AI Home screens, including 2025 refrigerators with 9" AI Home, the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo with a 4.3" AI Home display, the Bespoke AI Washer and Dryer set with a 7" AI Home, and the EHS Slim Fit ClimateHub. These screens serve as central hubs for managing daily life, offering features like food management, recipe recommendations, control of other appliances, and energy monitoring.

articles.title: McDonald's drops price of chicken nuggets to 99p for a limited time
articles.author: Neil Shaw
articles.summary: McDonald's is offering six Chicken McNuggets for 99p from January 27th to 30th. Customers can earn points with the MyMcDonald's Rewards program for every penny spent. All deals are available exclusively on the McDonald's App, where customers can also access deal drops every Monday and redeem offers for McDelivery and in-store purchases.

articles.title: Prosper with Vantage: Trade and Win Red Packets Worth Up to $888
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Vantage Markets is launching a "Red Packet Draw" promotional campaign for the Lunar New Year. This campaign offers users an opportunity to win while trading. The company also highlights its Vantage App, a mobile trading app that empowers clients to seize trading opportunities.

articles.title: Chinese beauty brand Florasis launches a flagship store in Tokyo
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Huaxizi (Florasis), a Chinese beauty brand, launched its first overseas flagship store in Tokyo's Ginza area. This makes it the first Chinese cosmetics brand to open a flagship store, aiming to introduce Chinese beauty products to international consumers through offline channels.

articles.title: Need strength training? Want a salad or smoothie? Try these new North Jersey spots
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Rumble Boxing in Montclair offers boxing-inspired group fitness. ISI Elite Training in Englewood will soon offer strength-training workouts. Just Salad in Livingston now offers salads, wraps, and other menu items.

articles.title: Chinese beauty brand Florasis launches a flagship store in Tokyo
articles.author: 陈柳兵
articles.summary: Florasis, a Chinese beauty brand, launched its first overseas flagship store in Tokyo's Ginza area on January 27, 2025. This follows the brand's previous launch of an online store on Amazon Japan in 2021 and a counter in Paris at the Samaritaine department store in September.

articles.title: Chinese startup launches DeepSeek R1 to compete with OpenAI
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: DeepSeek has launched DeepSeek R1, a new AI model designed for complex reasoning, rivaling OpenAI's ChatGPT. The model is a cost-effective alternative to GPT models, offering high performance with reduced expenses and is accessible through open-source, smaller versions that can run locally.

articles.title: OpenAI Introduces Operator: Your Autonomous AI Agent for Online Tasks
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced Operator, an autonomous AI agent designed for online tasks, to ChatGPT Pro users in the United States. This tool uses the Computer-Using Agent (CUA) model, integrating GPT-4's vision and reasoning, to perform tasks like booking reservations and purchasing products on platforms such as DoorDash, Instacart, Uber, and eBay.

articles.title: Coke jumps on a nostalgic trend with new Coca-Cola Orange Cream flavor
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching a new flavor, Coca-Cola Orange Cream, on February 10th in the U.S. and Canada. It will be available in regular and zero sugar options and is planned to be sold at least through the first quarter of 2026. This launch reflects Coca-Cola's effort to accelerate its product development and adapt to fast changing consumer preferences.

articles.title: Upgraded specs, design introduced in new RELX product
articles.summary: RELX launched the RELX Nova, a new vaping device featuring enhanced battery life, smoother airflow, and a Mega Mesh Atomizer technology. The device also includes a Dynamic LED Display and an Adjustable Airflow system for personalized use. RELX Nova offers two new flavor collections Icy Series and Flavor+ Series catering to a wider range of vaping preferences.

articles.title: ⚡Galaxy S24 Ultra Price in India; Check Features, Specifications of Samsung's Flagship Phone
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra is now available at a discounted price. This follows the launch of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra. Offers, specifications, and features are available.

articles.title: MS Dhoni leads Livfast's new TVC for smart wi-fi inverter
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Livfast, under the SAR Group, has launched a new smart inverter featuring power cut prediction and remote monitoring via an app. The product aims to provide uninterrupted power and peace of mind, catering to the evolving needs of modern consumers. The launch is supported by a new TVC featuring MS Dhoni.

articles.title: Lava Yuva Smart launches in India at Rs 6,000 introductory price
articles.author: ETTelecom
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Lava Yuva Smart smartphone at an introductory price of Rs 6,000. The phone features a Unisoc 9863A octa-core chipset, a 6.75-inch HD+ display, a 13MP AI dual rear camera, and runs on Android 14 Go edition. It is available in three colors and comes with a 1-year warranty.

articles.title: Best guide on how to master your Flipkart Wishlist
articles.summary: Flipkart is enabling users to streamline shopping by introducing and managing collections via the Wishlist feature within its Android app. Users can add items by clicking the heart icon and manage their Wishlist through their profile, including deleting items and discovering similar products. This feature also integrates with Flipkart Ping for sharing wishlists, facilitating organized shopping and purchase planning.

articles.title: Tims China Opens First Store in Nanchang
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: TH International Limited (Tims China) has launched its first Tim Hortons store in Nanchang, Jiangxi Province. The store opening coincides with the launch of a Chinese New Year menu that includes new items like the Buttery Red Bean Bagel Latte and Tuna Bagel Sandwich. The company has also renovated 639 stores to feature 'made-to-order' food preparation.

articles.title: Tims China Opens First Store in Nanchang
articles.author: TH International Limited
articles.summary: TH International Limited (Tims China) has opened its first Tim Hortons store in Nanchang, Jiangxi Province. Coinciding with the opening, Tims China is launching a Chinese New Year menu, including new items like the Buttery Red Bean Bagel Latte and Tuna Bagel Sandwich.

articles.title: How to use AR View on Android? Try these steps
articles.summary: Amazon introduces AR View, an augmented reality feature within its app that allows users to visualize home furnishing products in their own space before making a purchase. Users need to install the Amazon app and ARCore to utilize this feature, which offers over 15,000 products for visualization.

articles.title: Sam Altman compares Operator launch to ChatGPT: Here is how they are different
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Operator, a new AI agent powered by the Computer-Using Agent (CUA) model, that can independently perform tasks on the web, such as ordering groceries and completing forms. Operator differs from ChatGPT, as it can interact with webpages by typing, clicking, and scrolling. While currently available in the US, OpenAI plans to expand it to other regions and is addressing early user issues to ensure functionality.

articles.title: Actresses posing as robots cause buzz on Orchard Road, were promoting Jack Neo's new AI film
articles.author: Trixy Toh
articles.summary: Jack Neo's AI-themed comedy film, 'I Want to Be Boss', was promoted with actresses posing as robots in Orchard Road. The film incorporates AI for specific shots and music, and it stars Henry Thia and features Singaporean actress Jae Liew. The movie received mixed reactions from netizens.

articles.title: This CNY Just Got More Ong With 7-Eleven CAFé's RM1 Creamy Soft Serve Treats!
articles.author: Khirthnadhevi Kumar
articles.summary: 7-Eleven CAFé launched 'Soft Serve Ong, Sayang Konfirm On' promotion for Chinese New Year. This promotion offers soft serve treats for RM1. It is meant to bring good fortune and prosperity.

articles.title: 55 Weird New Things On Amazon That Are Actually Life-Changing
articles.author: Megan Harrington
articles.summary: Various companies have introduced new products designed to enhance comfort, organization, and convenience in daily life. Bedsure launched a Wearable Blanket Hoodie; COOL-ANGLE introduced a Faucet Drip Catcher Mat; TheraICE launched Headache Ice Pack; Cerrota launched a Mini Humidifier. Gaiatop introduced Hand Warmers. Thermosis introduced Insulated Water Bottle and Boxer Gifts launched stress relief toy. Cabinet Caddy has introduced spice rack organizer; Smofish has introduced Cord Organizer Holder; JIKIOU has launched Cloud Keyboard Wrist Rest; LISEN has launched 4 in 1 Retractable Car Charger; JOYTUTUS has launched Car Coin Holder; Zyliss has launched 5 Way Opener; YCOCO has launched Kitchen Waste Bin; Vigar has launched Ladybug Dish Scrub Brush; SenseAGE has launched Cord Organizer; Ivyu has launched Zipper Pocket Scrunchies; Luvan has launched Mouthwash Dispenser; IMPRESA has launched Food Prep Bowls; Nulubuu has launched Chenille Ball Towel Set; MoChic has launched Flat Water Bottle; Sirensky has launched Cactus Coaster Set; SpaceAid has launched Bed Sheet Organizers; Vlando has launched Travel Jewelry Bags; Agirlvct has launched Mushroom Toothpick Dispenser; MIKEDE has launched Magnetic Hooks; Dermasuri has launched Exfoliating Back Scrubber; Tucketts has launched Pilates Socks With Grips; chhwau has launched Form Whip Maker; WallCharmers has launched Paper Towel Holder; bzyoo has launched Divided Bowl; Haley's has Corker launched Corker; One has Fire launched Portable Light; ban.do has launched Cocktail Measuring Jigger; Gracenal has launched Acrylic Cutting Board; OHINGLT has launched Necklace Layering Clasp; Danpoo has launched Paper Towel Holder; Botanic has Tree launched Face Wash; Prudiut has launched Book Page Holder; ZenToes has launched Bunion Guards; MEDICUBE has launched Collagen Jelly Cream; Royal Assad has launched Laundry Hamper; Vabaso has launched Electric Lunch Box; ULVEOL has launched Microwave Bowl Cloth; ComfiLife has launched Knee Pillow; MOXE has launched Eucalyptus Oil Shower Mist; Thirteen has Chefs launched Cutting Board Feet; Macy's has Place launched Wood Cutting Board Wax.

articles.title: TECHSPO Dallas-Fort Worth
articles.summary: TECHSPO Dallas gathers developers, brands, and technology providers to showcase the next generation of technology and innovation. Exhibitors present their companies and emerging products to consumers, investors, press, talent, and tech enthusiasts.

articles.title: DigitalOcean Simplifies AI Agent Creation With Its Managed GenAI Platform
articles.author: Janakiram MSV
articles.summary: DigitalOcean has launched its GenAI platform aimed at making generative AI accessible to businesses, particularly developers and startups. The platform features tools for creating custom AI agents, integrating knowledge bases, and performing advanced function calls. It includes access to foundational models from Meta, Mistral AI, and Anthropic, and focuses on an intuitive interface and transparent pricing, differentiating it from competitors like Amazon Bedrock, Microsoft Azure AI, and Google Vertex AI.

articles.title: First-store economy going full throttle
articles.summary: The "first-store economy" in China drives the introduction of new products and services. Cities are attracting domestic and international brands to open their first stores, leading to new shopping experiences and increased consumer traffic. For example, Beijing saw approximately 900 first stores open in 2024, contributing to urban commercial development.

articles.title: First-store economy going full throttle
articles.author: Li Jiaying
articles.summary: Domino's Pizza launched its first store in Shijiazhuang. Xiabu Xiabu opened nine new stores and introduced new products like the "drunken chicken pot". These companies aim to attract consumers and drive growth through new store openings and innovative product offerings.

articles.title: DeepSeek: Chinese chatbot sends shockwaves through US stock market
articles.author: Moneyweek
articles.summary: China launched a cheaper, more efficient version of ChatGPT. This launch could potentially challenge Silicon Valley's dominance in the AI sector. The new version of ChatGPT is positioned as a new AI service.

articles.title: Papa Johns combines pizza and baguettes for on-the-go treat
articles.author: The Peninsula
articles.summary: Papa Johns launched its new French Baguette Pizza in Qatar on January 23, 2025. This product features a crunchy baguette base, tomato sauce, and cheese, and is designed for convenience and busy lifestyles.

articles.title: Coca-Cola Orange Cream to Launch in U.S. & Canada on Feb 10
articles.author: Virtual Jerusalem
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is introducing a new flavor following the Coca-Cola Spiced release. This constitutes a new product launch from the company.

articles.title: Sunvoy eShop helps solar installers upsell existing customers
articles.author: Solar Builder
articles.summary: Sunvoy launched eShop, a service enabling solar installers to configure branded online shops. This platform allows installers to upsell to existing customers, aiming to generate new revenue streams with minimal customer acquisition costs.

articles.title: Introducing Abstract: The Highly Anticipated Consumer Blockchain to Bring Crypto to the Masses
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: Abstract unveiled over 100 new ecosystem apps and projects. These apps and projects are designed to bring people onchain with an intuitive, engaging, and vibrant platform. The platform is tailored for everyday consumers.

articles.title: Coke jumps on a nostalgic trend with new Coca-Cola Orange Cream flavor
articles.author: ABC News
articles.summary: Coke is introducing a new flavor to its product range. This addition expands the company's existing lineup with a novel offering.

articles.title: ‘Been doing this for years': Woman shares little-known use for Dawn dish soap. Does it work?
articles.author: The Daily Dot
articles.summary: Dawn dish soap can be used for washing hair as an alternative application to washing dishes. The product's usage has gone viral on TikTok after Margherita Schiliro shared this second use.

articles.title: Lava Yuva Smart With AI Camera and 5,000mAh Battery Launched in India
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Lava launched the Lava Yuva Smart in India on Monday. The Yuva Smart targets entry-level smartphone users in the Rs. 10,000 and below segment and is the newest addition to Lava's Yuva lineup.

articles.title: TiffinStash launches its tiffin marketplace in San Jose starting February 1
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: TiffinStash is launching its tiffin marketplace in San Jose, starting February 1.

articles.title: I think now could be the best time to buy a Nintendo Switch instead of ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The article suggests now is a good time to buy a Nintendo Switch in anticipation of the upcoming Nintendo Switch 2 launch. The launch of Nintendo Switch 2 is new product launch from Nintendo

articles.title: One Page Domain and Web Hosting Order System
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart launched a cheap alternative PHP software for domain and web hosting orders. The software supports ajax domain checker with whois lookup and allows adding domain and hosting to the shopping cart from a single page. domainCart enables users to sell domain names or offer hosting packages.

articles.title: Coca-Cola announces new Orange Cream flavor: 'Iconic and nostalgic taste'
articles.author: Fox News
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is launching a new flavor, Coca-Cola Orange Cream, nationwide starting February 10. This new soda combines the taste of Coca-Cola with refreshing orange and smooth, creamy vanilla flavors.

articles.title: Chompie's Introduces New 'Eggrything' Bagel FEB. 9
articles.summary: Chompie's is launching a new bagel variety called the 'Eggrything' bagel. The new bagel will be available at Chompie's locations starting Sunday, Feb. 9.

articles.title: Just in time for Valentine's Day, trade dispute with Colombia threatens flower imports
articles.author: PAUL WISEMAN
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is introducing a new flavor, Coca-Cola Orange Cream, capitalizing on a nostalgic trend. This represents a new product launch by the company.

articles.title: Chompie's Introduces New 'Eggrything' Bagel FEB. 9
articles.summary: Chompie's will introduce its new 'Eggrything' bagel variety on Sunday, Feb. 9, at its locations around the valley.
